div.div: 英國（United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland），倫敦（London）_倫敦眼（The London Eye）
夏威夷州（Hawaii），茂宜島（The island of Maui）_海勒卡拉國家公園（Haleakalā National Park）
俄羅斯（Россия，Russia），莫斯科（Москва，Moscow）_克里姆林宮（Московский Кремль，The Moscow Kremlin）
南韓（대한민국，South Korea）_晨靜樹木園（아침고요수목원，The Garden of Morning Calm）

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

a.onclick: window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=600, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=600, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=600, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
window.open(this.href, 'windowName', 'width=550, height=600, left=24, top=24, scrollbars, resizable'); return false;
